pkgmetadata.longdescription: Deep Forest Model // R application programming interface (API) for Deep Forest which based on Zhou and Feng (2017). Deep Forest: Towards an Alternative to Deep Neural Networks. (arXiv:1702.08835v2) or Zhou and Feng (2017). Deep Forest. (arXiv:1702.08835). And for the Python module 'gcForest' (https://github.com/pylablanche/gcForest).
